question.text: Analyze the given options and select the one that corresponds to have the least percentage value.

options.text: The percentage of drugs currently sold in the market worldwide which are derived from plants
The estimated percentage of total oxygen in the earth's atmosphere produced by Amazon forest through photosynthesis.
The percentage of tropical rain forests covering the earth's land surface presently.
The percentage of India's share of the global species diversity

solution.text: Once covering more than 14% of the earth's land surface, these rain forests now cover no more than 6%. Although India has only <math><mn>2.4</mn></math>% of the world's land area, its share of the global species diversity is an impressive 8.1%. More than 25% of the drugs currently sold in the market worldwide are derived from plants. Amazon forest is estimated to produce, through photosynthesis, 20% of the total oxygen in the earth's atmosphere.
